courses.title: Beginner Guitar Lessons
courses.description: Learn to play acoustic and electric guitar from scratch with step-by-step video tutorials.

courses.title: Piano for Beginners
courses.description: Master the basics of piano playing with practical lessons and easy-to-follow exercises.

courses.title: Mastering Music Theory
courses.description: Understand the foundation of music theory including scales, chords, and progressions.

courses.title: Singing Essentials
courses.description: Improve your vocal skills and learn breathing techniques with this comprehensive singing course.

courses.title: Electronic Music Production
courses.description: Create your own electronic tracks using professional DAWs and plugins.

courses.title: Jazz Improvisation Techniques
courses.description: Explore the art of improvisation with practical jazz exercises and theory.

courses.title: Drumming Basics
courses.description: Learn rhythm, timing, and techniques for drumming using practice pads and drum kits.

courses.title: Advanced Violin Mastery
courses.description: Take your violin skills to the next level with this expert-led advanced course.

courses.title: Ukulele Strumming Patterns
courses.description: Discover fun and effective strumming techniques to enhance your ukulele playing.

courses.title: Music Composition for Film
courses.description: Learn to compose cinematic music that evokes emotion and fits perfectly with visual scenes.
